rule: If it is impossible to determine the part-of-speech tag for the given word in the context of the provided sentence, the output must be exactly "CantAnswer" without any additional characters or text.
complianceText:
The chatbot's output "NN" is a part of speech tag, specifically for "Noun, singular or mass" according to the provided list of tags. The description requires the chatbot to return only the part of speech tag or "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" when applicable. Since "NN" is an acceptable part of speech tag as per the list provided, the output is compliant with the chatbot's description. 

No violation.
OK
